metricSystems

Class AbstractMetricSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • metricSystems.AbstractMetricSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMetricSystem, IPhysicalUnit
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImperialLengthMetricSystem, SiLengthMetricSystem, SiTimeMetricSystem

    public abstract class AbstractMetricSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPhysicalUnit, IMetricSystem
    Clase abstracta que contiene lo comun a todos los sistemas metricos.
    Author:
    Junco de las Heras y Marta Vaquerizo
